version_description:
All-new Winter Events bring in the new year right! Play the Events to dash through the snow, battle Dr. Eggman and earn new rewards.

Happy New Year from SEGA and the Sonic Team!

New Release:
- Fixes a crash affecting a small amount of players when accessing the inbox and an issue where ads appear after in-game purchases are made
- Removes the Sonic Dash 2 Apple Watch Companion App due to technical issues
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements to improve your game experience

New Release:
- Fixes minor bugs with the Enerbeam and tracks

ALL-NEW MOUNTAIN ZONE AND STICKS SPECIAL EVENTS

- Dash through the new Mountain Zone with Sonic and his friends.
- Drop the Boom on the Badniks with Sticks in her all new, special event.
- We also had the Chao polish a few other things to make sure you can stay up-to-date and compete against your friends around the world.

We’ve revamped the leaderboard making it easier to get to and see how well you’re doing against your friends. You can even compare your score against the cast of the Sonic Boom TV show, go for the high score and show the world how fast you can go!

We've also been busy jumping around squashing bugs and eating chili dogs.
